ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: what you are promised will certainly happen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: What is promised will surely come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely what you are promised shall come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: that whatever with which you have been warned will inevitably come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed what you are promised, will surely befall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Surely, what you are promised will occur.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely what you are threatened with must come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: surely that which you are promised is about to fall!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Surely that which ye are promised will befall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that which you have been promised shall be fulfilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily that which ye are promised is about to befall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: what you are promised will surely befall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Assuredly, what ye are promised must come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Surely, what you are promised must come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: surely, that which you have been promised is about to fall!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Surely what you are promised will happen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:7] Surely that which you are promised, O disbelievers of Mecca, in the way of resurrection and chastisement, will befall: it will be, without any doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Surely that which ye are promised) of reward and punishment in the Hereafter (will befall) will happen and visit you.
